operation.name: InsertOrUpdate
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_profile_photos (user_id, photo_id, date2, deleted) VALUES (:user_id, :photo_id, :date2, 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE date2 = VALUES(date2), deleted = 0

operation.name: SelectList
operation.sql: SELECT photo_id FROM user_profile_photos WHERE user_id = :user_id AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY date2 DESC

operation.name: SelectNext
operation.sql: SELECT photo_id FROM user_profile_photos WHERE user_id = :user_id AND photo_id NOT IN (:id_list) AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY date2 DESC LIMIT 1

operation.name: Delete
operation.sql: UPDATE user_profile_photos SET deleted = 1, date2 = 0 WHERE user_id = :user_id AND photo_id IN (:id_list)
